subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pat Dobson, one of four starters to win 20 games for the Orioles in 1971, later was a member of an illustrious pitching staff in Baltimore and a savvy scouting department with the San Francisco Giants.
snippet: Pat Dobson, one of four starters to win 20 games for the Orioles in 1971, later was a member of an illustrious pitching staff in Baltimore and a savvy scouting department with the San Francisco Giants.
